title: Product Property of nth Roots
text: $$\sqrt[n]{a b}$$ is equal to $$\sqrt[n]{a} \sqrt[n]{b}$$ as long as a and $$b$$ are integers $$ \geq $$ $$2$$ and their roots are real numbers

title: Simplifying Even Roots
text: When taking the nth root of some integer $$x$$ $$ \geq $$ $$2$$, if $$n$$ is even, the answer is $$|x|$$
speech: When taking the nth root of some integer  x  , is greater than or equal to   2 , if  n  is even, the answer is  the absolute value of x

title: Not Always a Real Answer
text: When taking the nth root of a number, if $$n$$ is even, then there is only a real answer if the number is positive or $$0$$
